name: Japanese Vocabulary CSV Schema
description: Schema for generating new rows in data/vocab.csv for a Japanese vocabulary flashcard app

columns.name: Kanji
columns.description: The word in its standard written form (kanji, katakana for loanwords, or hiragana if no kanji exists)
rules: Use kanji when the word has a common kanji form
Use katakana for loanwords (gairaigo) from English or other languages
Use hiragana for words without kanji or when hiragana is the standard form

columns.name: Reading (Kana)
columns.description: The phonetic reading in hiragana (or katakana if the word is a loanword)
rules: For katakana loanwords, the reading matches the Kanji column
Use standard readings; note irregular readings in Usage/Notes

values.Noun: Standard noun, conjugates with です/で/じゃない/だった
values.Noun (Suru): Noun that becomes a verb with する (e.g., 勉強する)
values.Irregular: Irregular verb (する, 来る, and compound verbs)
values.I-Adjective: Adjective ending in い, conjugates with い patterns
values.Na-Adjective: Adjective using な when modifying, conjugates like nouns
values.Adverb: Modifies verbs/adjectives, no conjugation (use '-' for forms)
values.Phrase: Set expression, no conjugation (use '-' for forms)
values.Location: Spatial/directional word, no conjugation (use '-' for forms)
values.Time: Temporal expression, no conjugation (use '-' for forms)

patterns.U-Verb: Change final -u to -imasu (e.g., 書く→書きます)
patterns.Ru-Verb: Replace -ru with -masu (e.g., 食べる→食べます)
patterns.Irregular: します, 来ます, or compound (e.g., 勉強します)

columns.name: Te-form
columns.description: Conjunctive form used for connecting, requests, progressive

U-Verb.-く: → いて (書く→書いて, exception: 行く→行って)

patterns.Irregular: して, 来て, or compound (e.g., 勉強して)
patterns.I-Adjective: Replace -い with -くて (高い→高くて)

patterns.U-Verb: Change final -u to -anai (書く→書かない, exception: -う→わない)
patterns.Irregular: しない, 来ない, or compound
patterns.I-Adjective: Replace -い with -くない (高い→高くない)

U-Verb.-く: → いた (書く→書いた, exception: 行く→行った)

patterns.Irregular: した, 来た, or compound
patterns.I-Adjective: Replace -い with -かった (高い→高かった)

columns.name: Usage/Notes
columns.description: Optional field for additional context, exceptions, or usage notes
examples: Slang: posting yummy food photos at night
Exception: Looks like Ru, conjugates like U
use_cases: Indicate pitch accent patterns when disambiguation is helpful
Flag conjugation exceptions (Ru-verbs that conjugate as U-verbs)
Add cultural context or usage tips

verb_exceptions.description: Some verbs look like Ru-verbs but conjugate as U-verbs
verb_exceptions.note: Add 'Exception: Looks like Ru, conjugates like U' to Usage/Notes

csv_format.escape: Double quotes for values containing commas
